author: IGN
description:
MechWest is an independently-produced, 3D animated series set in a sci-fi-tinged version of the Old West. The team behind the show took the stage at IGN Live to break down how they looked to Avatar: The Last Airbender for inspiration on how to build a compelling world, and the show's co-creators Dave and Noah Gallagher tell us what it's like producing a show as father and son.

MechWest's first two episodes are streaming on YouTube now.

#IGN #IGNLive2025
title: MechWest’s World-building Takes Its Cues From Avatar: The Last Airbender | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at the colorful world of Little Nemo and the Guardians of Slumberland in this latest trailer for the upcoming Metroidvania game. Little Nemo and the Guardians of Slumberland will be available in Q1 2026 on PC (Steam) and Nintendo Switch, with a limited-time demo available on Steam now.

In Little Nemo and the Guardians of Slumberland, explore a dream world as the iconic Little Nemo, armed with toys, candy, and stuffed animals. Experience NES-era platformer gameplay in a vast, non-linear world that has been hand-animated frame-by-frame, as you unlock new abilities to progress.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Little Nemo and the Guardians of Slumberland - Official Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
title: WWE Intercontinental Champ Dominik Mysterio goes from 12th to 1st in Mario Kart World at #ignlive !

author: IGN
description: Show off your menacing aura as Zohakuten. Meet Zohakuten and see the character in action in this new Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 trailer for the upcoming action game. Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will be available on PC, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch on August 5, 2025.
title: Demon Slayer Kimetsu no Yaiba: The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - Official Zohakuten Character Trailer

author: IGN
title: Neil Patrick Harris voices Deadpool in the new Deadpool VR game coming this year. #ignsummerofgaming

author: IGN
description:
Meet the characters, check out new gameplay, and more in this latest Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation trailer for the upcoming boomer shooter game about a sailor with a shotgun for an arm. Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation features a cartoony, hand-drawn art style and gory gameplay. You'll have to mow down enemies through 8 action-packed locales to take back what's yours. Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation will be available on PC in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation - Official Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Gameplay Trailer for Toxic Crusaders, an action beat-em-up game developed by Gamecom Team. Players will take control of one of seven playable characters, each with their own unique moves and abilities. Check out the latest trailer highlighting new levels and an electrifying boss fight. Toxic Crusaserd is launching in Q3 2025 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Toxic Crusaders - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the trailer for No Straight Roads 2, follow-up sequel to the 2020 music and rhythm-focused action game from developer Metronomik (including Final Fantasy 15 lead game designer Wan Hazmer). No Straight Roads 2 is currently in development for PC and consoles.

#IGN #Gaming
title: No Straight Roads 2 - Official Announce Trailer | Southeast Asian Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at OFF in this new trailer for the indie RPG that first released in 2008. This new OFF trailer shows combat and more. This updated version of OFF includes a new battle system, new areas and bosses, a new soundtrack, and more. OFF will be available in 2025 on PC and Nintendo Switch. 

In OFF, you take control of the Batter as he seeks to purify an uncanny and hopeless world haunted by specters, and guided by a cryptic, grinning cat called The Judge.

#IGN #Gaming
title: OFF - Official Developer Overview Trailer | The MIX Summer Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
A trolley is approaching five people tied to the track. If you switch to another track, one person will die. What do you do? Find out in this collection of minigames. Wishlist The Trolley Solution on Steam now.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Trolley Solution - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description: Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) comes to Bleach Rebirth of Souls. Check out the latest Bleach Rebirth of Souls trailer to meet Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) ahead of DLC's launch. Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) will be available separately as DLC on June 17, and as part of the Season Pass with 7-day early access on June 10, 2025. The latest game update also includes the Ranked Matchmaking mode.
title: Bleach Rebirth of Souls - Official Ichigo Kurosaki (Thousand-Year Blood War Arc) Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a Big Walk with your friends – and get lost (or simply hang out) in a weird, playful world. It's all about communication, whether solving problems or simply watching the sunset together. (Or stealing your friend’s binoculars and kicking them into the ocean.) This cooperative adventure is from the developers of Untitled Goose Game.

Big Walk will be released on PC in 2025. Wishlist it on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1478500/Big_Walk/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Big Walk - Official Gameplay Trailer | Day of the Devs: Summer Game Fest Edition

author: IGN
description:
Check out the new Ironheart trailer for this upcoming Marvel Television series. Ironheart stars Dominique Thorne as genius inventor Riri Williams. The series also stars Lyric Ross, Alden Ehrenreich, Regan Aliyah, Manny Montana, Matthew Elam and Anji White. Ironheart launches on Disney+ on June 24, 2025.

Set after the events of “Black Panther: Wakanda Forever,” Marvel Television’s “Ironheart” pits technology against magic when Riri Williams (Thorne), determined to make her mark on the world, returns to her hometown of Chicago. Her unique take on building iron suits is brilliant, but in pursuit of her ambitions, she finds herself wrapped up with the mysterious yet charming Parker Robbins aka “The Hood” (Anthony Ramos).

Chinaka Hodge is head writer; episodes are directed by Sam Bailey and Angela Barnes. Executive producers include Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Brad Winderbaum, Zoie Nagelhout, Chinaka Hodge, Ryan Coogler, Sev Ohanian and Zinzi Coogler. Produced in association with Prox
title: Ironheart - Official Trailer 2 (2025) Dominique Thorne, Anthony Ramos, Alden Ehrenreich

author: IGN
description:
Black Voices in Gaming is a Black-led, national nonprofit founded in Oakland California committed to increasing Black representation and Inclusion within the Gaming Industry. Join us on June 9th at 9pm PT to celebrate new gaming titles and returning favorites.

#IGN
title: Black Voices in Games 2025 Summer Edition

author: IGN
description:
Discover your legacy as the heir to a legendary African samurai in YASUKE: A Lost Descendent. Challenge enemies in futuristic swordplay, pull off some high-velocity parkour, and become an awesome anime hero.

Play the demo and add YASUKE: A Lost Descendant to your wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2446760/YASUKE_A_Lost_Descendant/
title: YASUKE: A Lost Descendant - Official Gameplay Trailer | Black Voices in Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Can skydiving get any more badass? Yep – just add finger guns. In this pulse-pounding multiplayer FPS you'll be fighting four other skydivers for one parachute. Gain speed in their slipstreams, use your limited finger-ammo wisely, and make it to the ground safely. 

Add Aerial_Knight's DropShot to your Steam wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3465190/Aerial_Knights_DropShot/
title: Aerial_Knight's DropShot - Official Gameplay Trailer | Black Voices in Gaming

author: IGN
description:
We’ve already done a more traditional preview that looks at the meat and potatoes experience of playing Ninja Gaiden Ragebound, so this time, let’s dig into the nitty gritty. These are the 7 coolest things about Ninja Gaiden's return to 2D. Previewed by Will Borger.

#NinjaGaidenRagebound #Gaming #IGN
title: Ninja Gaiden Ragebound: The 7 Coolest Things

author: IGN
description: The thing that's always bugged us about the previous Jurassic World Evolution games is that they seemed a bit stripped-down compared to what Frontier has shown us is possible with their sister franchises, Planet Zoo and Planet Coaster. So the thing we're most excited about with Evolution 3 is that it seems like we're finally getting the full Frontier feature set in a Jurassic game. Previewed by Leana Hafer
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 Lets You Channel Your Inner John Hammond

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at a creepy, atmospheric gameplay sequence from ILL, the upcoming narrative-driven first-person horror game from developer Team Clout that promises "an advanced dismemberment system." It's in the works for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1757350/ILL/

#ILL #Gaming #IGN
title: ILL: Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Xbox summer showcase from June 8, 2025 had some huge reveals and surprises, including Call of Duty Black Ops: 7, an Xbox/ROG team up handheld, a Hollow Knight: Silksong release date hint, High on Life 2, Persona 4 Remake, Grounded 2 and more. Here's a partial list of games that appeared in the stream:

-The ROG Xbox Ally X handheld
-Call of Duty Black Ops: 7
-Hollow Knight: Silksong 
-Invincible VS Fighting
-The Persona 4 Remake
-Clockwork Revolution
-Grounded 2
-Beast of Reincarnation (From Pokemon Developer, Game Freak)
-Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade
-Final Fantasy 16 
-Keeper (from Double Fine)
-Indiana Jones and the Great Circle DLC - The Order of Giants
-Ninja Gaiden 4
-Super Meat Boy 3D
title: Xbox Showcase June 2025: Everything Announced

author: IGN
description:
In a conversation brought to you by GamesIndustry.biz at IGN Live, edenic CEO & Managing Partner Neil Young joins IGN publisher John Davison for a deep-dive conversation exploring how artificial intelligence is already reshaping game development: from streamlining workflows, to enabling new player experiences, and where it might take the industry next while navigating questions of innovation, ethics, and the future of creativity in games.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by Nintendo Switch 2. All Together, Anytime, Anywhere.
title: How AI Could Change The Way Games Are Made: A Conversation with edenic’s Neil Young | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description: Join IDW Comics creators Patrick Horvath (Beneath the Trees Where Nobody Sees: Rite of Spring), Christopher Cantwell (Star Trek: Red Shirts) and Robbie Thompson (Star Trek: Strange New Worlds - The Seeds of Destruction) for an in-depth discussion about their new and upcoming books. From Horvath's sequel to his hit comic Beneath the Trees Where Nobody Sees, which has been dubbed “Dexter with cute anthropomorphic characters," to Cantwell's exploration of Starfleet's finest -- if doomed -- Red Shirts to Thompson's new “Lovecraftian horror” tale set in the era of Captain Pike, the three chat about what it takes these days to write comic books which leave a lasting impression on the reader.
title: Star Trek: Red Shirts Promises to Kill Starfleet’s Finest in the Grisliest Ways Possible | IGN Live

author: IGN
description:
Austin Wintory is a multi time Grammy nominated composer for some of the biggest games, from Journey, to Assassins Creed: syndicate, and now Towerborne. He stopped by IGN Live to show us how he wrote some of gamings first grammy nominated songs and how he created an immersive and dynamic score for Towerborne.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: From Gaming to Grammys, Why Austin Wintory’s Music Scores The Biggest Games | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
IGN Live 2025 welcomes Nico Coutant, Director of Production and Andrew Gant, Community Manager, of Blade and Soul Heroes to talk about evolving combat, creating a party with elemental strategies and running into bosses in the wild. 

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by FX’s Alien: Earth. Premieres August 12th on FX and Hulu.
title: Everything NEW Coming to Blade and Soul Heroes | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
The ultimate dungeon brawler. A revolutionary, physics-fueled throwdown, where you'll jump, slide, and collide on your adnventure to restore peace to the Awaysis - an ancient floating relic under attack by forces of great darkness! 

Presented by Cult Games
title: Cult Games' Awaysis - Exclusive Partner Spotlight - IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
FBC: Firebreak's Game Director Mike Kayatta talks to IGN's Daemon Hatfield about making the game, states what weapon he thinks is the craziest in the game, and touches on Firebreak connecting to the Remedy-verse. Plus, Kayatta brought prizes for IGN Live fans, including SOAP!

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by PlayStation Days of Play. Get the PlayStation 5 Digital console with the Call of Duty Black Ops 6 bundle. Starting at $399.99. While supplies last.

#FBCFirebreak #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: How FBC: Firebreak Connects The Remedy-verse | IGN Live

author: IGN
description:
IGN's Alan Knight hosted a special id@Xbox panel at IGN Live, all about indie games including the latest Meat Boy 3d game which was announced today. Glenn Gregory, Director of Marketing, Xbox, Chris Charla, GM of Portfolio and Planning, Xbox and Zhenghua Yang (Z), CEO of Serenity Forge talked us through the history of indie games in the early days of consoles and how great indie games get made.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNLive2025
title: ID@Xbox Talks Its Secret Sauce to Making Winning Indie Games | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch Part 1 here: https://youtu.be/o7sI04Kd7VM

Spoilers follow for The Last of Us Season 2!

Now that The Last of Us Season 2 has come to an end, the team behind the HBO series stopped by IGN Live to break down some of the most pivotal moments of the game to TV show adaptation. Craig Mazin (Co-Creator / Executive Producer / Writer / Director) is joined by Ksenia Sereda (Cinematographer), Ann Foley (Costume Designer), Don Macaulay (Production Designer), Alex Wang (VFX Supervisor), Timothy Good (Editor) and David Fleming (Co-Composer) to dig in on what it took to create scenes like Joel's death, the horde attack, the planetarium, and more.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by Lenovo Legion. Reach Your Impossible

#TheLastOfUs #IGNLive2025 #HBO
title: The Last of Us Creators Break Down Season 2’s Most Iconic Moments (Part 2) | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description: Before/After: Playing Mario Kart World against the our reviewer, @loganjplant #IGNLive #IGN
title: Playing Mario Kart World Against IGN At #IGNLive

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the remake of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4 with Director Kurt Tillmanns of Iron Galaxy, covering how it feels picking up the torch of the legendary skating series, the inclusion of Mikey from TMNT, and much more.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by MindsEye. Pre-Order Now.
title: How a Ninja Turtle Ended Up In The Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4 Remake | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Co-op games are having a renaissance and Hela is joining the mix with its exploration of nature, wildlife, and Scandinavian folklore. Creative director Martin Sahlin visits IGN Live to talk about how Hela's puzzles and sense of discovery complement that whimsy of playing as cute little mice, but also gets into the challenges of making games in general. It's one co-op adventure game to pay attention to and it's coming soon.

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by FX’s Alien: Earth. Premieres August 12th on FX and Hulu.
title: It Takes Two Mice to Explore the Whimsical World of the New Co-op Game Hela | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
McFarlane Toys is bringing the heat to IGN Live 2025 with an exclusive reveal of their latest Doom: The Dark Ages action figures, alongside stunning new collectibles from Diablo IV, Fallout, and Persona 3 Reload! Join Brian Walters (Director of Brand Creative) and hosts Max Scoville & Brian Altano as they unbox the brutal Dark Ages Doom Slayer, break down the Elite Edition’s premium details, and showcase Lilith (Diablo IV), the T-60 Power Armor (Fallout 76), and the Protagonist (Persona 3 Reload). Want to see these figures up close? Stick around for the full reveal!

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by MindsEye. Pre-Order Now.
title: Doom: The Dark Ages, Diablo IV, Fallout and Persona Get New McFarlane Toys | IGN Live 2025

author: IGN
description:
Armed with a multi-functional tool with a Scottish accent, a passion for property management, a bunch of quirky Brits to meet by the seaside, and musical sequences to boot, There's No Ghost at The Grand is a cozy mystery adventure in a class of its own. No Ghost's Writer/Director Anil Glendinning, Lead Animator Chi Chii Huang, and Gampleay Lead Jack Conrad took the stage at IGN Live to tease what we can expect... and what we can't expect. They're adamant... there ARE NO GHOSTS AT THE GRAND! (Sure...)

IGN's Summer of Gaming is presented by MindsEye. Pre-Order Now.

#TheresNoGhostAtTheGrand #IGNLive2025 #Gaming
title: How There Are No Ghosts at The Grand Balances Lovecraftian Mystery and Hotel Renovation

author: IGN
description:
Take a closer look at Blade & Soul Heroes in this gameplay video for the upcoming free-to-play collectible action MMORPG. The Blade & Souls Heroes video shows the heroes, field exploration, field battle, team formation, PVE play like Team Raid and Solo Raid, PVE turn-based combat, and more. , Blade & Soul Heroes mixes real-time combat with strategic team-building, deep character collection features, and cross-play capabilities for PC (PURPLE, Steam) and mobile (iOS, Android). Blade & Souls Heroes will be available in Q3 2025, and pre-registration is available now.

Set three years before iconic MMORPG Blade & Soul, Blade & Soul Heroes explores the lead character Yusol’s quest to restore her family name. As players explore, they'll collect new heroes and strategically switch between them to counter enemies' specific weaknesses, adapting their teams to overcome varied challenges to ensure victory. Players will collect as many as 40+ characters ranging from young heroes to monsters to be
title: Blade & Soul Heroes - Official Gameplay | IGN Live 2025
